content.rendered:
Directed by Durul Taylan. Yagmur Taylan

Written by Engin Günaydin

Cast Engin Günaydin( Yusuf6 episodes, 2022 ). Tamer Karadagli( Halit6 episodes, 2022 ). Derya Karadas( Meryem6 episodes, 2022 ). Turgut Tuncalp( Mahmut Timuçin6 episodes, 2022 ). Gülçin Santircioglu( Sahinde6 episodes, 2022 ). Sebnem Hassanisoughi( Fadime6 episodes, 2022 ). Yuliia Sobol( Svetlana6 episodes, 2022 ). Doga Zeynep Doguslu( Akya6 episodes, 2022 ). Ergin Torun( Velihan6 episodes, 2022 ). Melissa Dilber( Ahu6 episodes, 2022 ). Merih Dilber( Asu6 episodes, 2022 ). Zeynep Selimoglu( Sila6 episodes, 2022 ). Berkay Özgür( Ferit6 episodes, 2022 ). Merve Ates( Bensu6 episodes, 2022 ). Rae Varela( Ahu5 episodes, 2022 ). Yagmur Özbek( Bensu’s Friend2 episodes, 2022 ). Sencar Sagdic( Kadir1 episode, 2022 ). Ramazan Keskin( Young Mahmut Timuçin1 episode, 2022 ). Lidya Nisan Ertemiz( Young Sahinde1 episode, 2022 ). Gokcen Gokcebag( Barber1 episode, 2022 ). Onur Altinkaya( Yamaç1 episode, 2022 ). Erkan Uyaniksoy( Salesman1 episode, 2022 ). Kaan Özatar( Waiter1 episode, 2022 ). Evren Erler( Doctor1 episode, 2022 ). Halil Mehmet Simsek( Waiter1 episode, 2022 ). Murat Kartoglu( Painter1 episode, 2022 ). Kerem Akti( Pharmacist1 episode, 2022 ). Gülay Say( Teacher1 episode, 2022 )

Language Turkish

Producers Müge Kolat. Adil Sanal. Serdar Sen. Durul Taylan. Yagmur Taylan

Certificate 15+

Official site Netflix Site

Season 1

Total Episodes 6
